Html:
Hi Everyone,

First of all thanks in advance!

Would like to know if its possible to know the streets intersections?

I dont have no clue how to accomplish that need.

But I think it's something possible because my GPS Software iGo (Primo) has that feature.

 

[]'s

hey ;}

too bad we don't have iGO sources ;} ...anyway using openstreetmap data this would be quite possible

first of all thanks for your work in this project.

Do you have any idea how to get this data?

Do you think I'll need to get the data directly from the map (image)?

By the way, I've implemented Tile Cache using Extensible Storage Engine, 
do you think that this implementation could help the project?

 

[]'s
any implementation, be welcome to share by creating fork ;}
